@luarmor/global/LRM_INIT_SCRIPT.documentation:
## Warning

You **must** yield somewhere, even if it's just a `task.wait()` at the end. Otherwise, `script_key` will read as nil.

## Description

This macro allows you to run a piece of code before your script is ran. It accepts a **constant** function.
@luarmor/global/LRM_INIT_SCRIPT.code_sample:
LRM_INIT_SCRIPT(function()
    -- some code

    -- wait for the user to put the key in or something
    while HasUserCompleted == false do
        -- but this wait is needed!! 
        task.wait()
    end
end)

@luarmor/global/script_key.documentation: The script key used to execute the script, if one was provided.

@luarmor/global/LRM_IsUserPremium.documentation:
A `boolean` indicating if the user is premium or not. This is useful for FFA scripts ('freemium').

## Note

Ad Reward keys are considered premium since a key was used to execute the script. Instead, you might want to check if `LRM_UserNote == "Ad Reward"`.

@luarmor/global/LRM_LinkedDiscordID.documentation:
The linked Discord ID of the user.

## Note

This is their ID, not username. You need to use some API to get their username.

@luarmor/global/LRM_ScriptName.documentation: The name of the current script.

@luarmor/global/LRM_TotalExecutions.documentation: The total executions from this `script_key`. It will be `0` by default.

@luarmor/global/LRM_SecondsLeft.documentation:
The seconds left until expiry on this `script_key` from the time of execution. It will be `math.huge` if `auth_expire` isn't set.

## Note

This does not update automatically.

@luarmor/global/LRM_UserNote.documentation: The user note. It will be `Not specified` by default.

@luarmor/global/LRM_ScriptVersion.documentation: The version of the script. It's in the format of `x.x.x.x` where `x` is a number. For example: `0.0.1.2`.

@luarmor/global/LRM_SEND_WEBHOOK.documentation: Sends a webhook to the given discord webhook url with the given data.

@luarmor/global/LRM_SANITIZE.documentation: Sanitizes the given value of the webhook body with the given regex.
